attributes.action: National Service for all Young Male & People School Leavers aged 15-17 and those with criminal intent.
attributes.additional_details: Every Male & Female Juvenile when they leave school or if they choose not to go (those with criminal intent), should have to do National Service of 1 or 2 years learning respect and discipline. no matter what colour, race, religion.  If you live here and use the NHS & Governments benefits, you serve your country.
